short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: App for EECS 441 App Dev for Entrepeneuers!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Espi is made for students by students to bridge the gap between Gmail and Google Calendar. Never lose track of your assignments again with automatic email collection and the ability to batch multiple emails into Calendar Events. Links back to the original emails makes it easy to get back up to speed on context and previews help you filter before exporting.


Patch Notes:
Espi now lists emails by time received with the most recent at the top!
Hover descriptions for buttons!
Additional Settings!
Multiple Searches!
...And much more!
